text: Henri Aarnio (born 9 July 1993) is a Finnish male badminton player. He started playing badminton at 9 years old, then at age 19, he won the Finnish International Junior Championships in boys' singles. In 2015, he was the runner-up at the Slovak Open in the men's singles event and in 2016, he became the runner-up of the Hellas Open in the mixed doubles event with Jenny Nyström. In 2017, he became the runner-up at the Estonian International tournament in the men's doubles event partnered with Iikka Heino. == Achievements == === BWF International Challenge/Series (5 runners-up)=== Men's singles {| class="sortable wikitable" style="font-size: 90%;" !|Year !|Tournament !|Opponent !|Score !|Result |- |- style="background:#D5D5D5" |align="center"|2017 |align="left"|Hellas Open |align="left"| Kim Bruun |align="left"|12–21, 15–21 |style="text-align:left; background:white"| Runner- up |- |- style="background:#D5D5D5" |align="center"|2015 |align="left"|Slovak Open |align="left"| Alex Lane |align="left"|15–21, 9–21 |style="text- align:left; background:white"| Runner-up |} Men's doubles {| class="sortable wikitable" style="font-size: 90%;" !|Year !|Tournament !|Partner !|Opponent !|Score !|Result |- |- style="background:#D5D5D5" |align="center"|2017 |align="left"|Hellas Open |align="left"| Iikka Heino |align="left"| Kasper Antonsen Niclas Nohr |align="left"|17–21, 12–21 |style="text-align:left; background:white"| Runner-up |- |- style="background:#D5D5D5" |align="center"|2017 |align="left"|Estonian International |align="left"| Iikka Heino |align="left"| Bastian Kersaudy Julien Maio |align="left"|13–21, 14–21 |style="text-align:left; background:white"| Runner-up |} Mixed doubles {| class="sortable wikitable" style="font-size: 90%;" !|Year !|Tournament !|Partner !|Opponent !|Score !|Result |- |- style="background:#D5D5D5" |align="center"|2016 |align="left"|Hellas Open |align="left"| Jenny Nyström |align="left"| Pawel Pietryja Aneta Wojtkowska |align="left"|17–21, 17–21 |style="text-align:left; background:white"| Runner-up |} : BWF International Challenge tournament : BWF International Series tournament : BWF Future Series tournament == References == == External links == * Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Finnish male badminton players
